generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- person: A person is visible on the left side of the road, riding a bicycle.
- rider: The person on the bicycle is classified as a rider.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, and one is visible in the foreground.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging over the road at the intersection ahead.
- pole: Poles supporting traffic lights and signs are visible along the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles along the road.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible along the sidewalks and in front of buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, appearing overcast.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the left side of the road, being ridden by a person.
